website_summaries.verdict: The interior LED lighting is the star of this product. This case is all about durable protection and convenience that will last  a lifetime.
pros: A trusted brand name in guitar cases, this model features an interior LED light for when you're backstage looking for your favorite pick
Made from durable ABS plastic, you're purchasing strength and durability for your instrument
cons: Not specifically form fit for any particular model, the interior does favor models resembling Stratocaster types
And you will definitely have to remove the tremolo arm before closing, or there will be pressure on it

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this product. The latches on this case are complete garbage and flip open at the slightest touch. The exterior plastic itself may seem tough but was cracked upon arrival. I'm a US Marine living overseas and I am frankly too busy to deal with the headache of returning this very underwhelming product. This case, which probably cost the manufacturer under $5 to produce, is clearly not worth the $100. I would strongly urge anyone considering this guitar case to go to another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Demosthenes

customer_reviews.title: Ibanez RG6003FM fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: The reviews seemed mostly positive, but some said their Ibanez RG fit and others said it didn't. I decided to take a chance and it fits perfect! Great upgrade from a gig bag and for taking from studio to apartment. I absolutely love this case, its like the neck cutout was made for my Ibanez RG Wizard III neck! Latches are somewhat cheap, but if you are careful with them they will be just fine. I got a used one from Amazon Warehouse and its in mint condition. I highly recommend this case over the $55 Chromacast one from what ive seen and read.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Fits Paul Reed Smith (PRS) 30th Anniversary SE Floyd Custom 24 Solidbody Electric Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect my Paul Reed Smith (PRS) 30th Anniversary SE Floyd Custom 24 Solid body Electric Guitar. I am an amateur musician so I assume this model would not be recommended for airline / TSA inspection use. Guitar does not move around in case. Neck support is just about perfect! This thing is solid!
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to pay more than a hundred dollars for a case like this, especially since there are hard cases you can get for around $60. I own one of those $60 cases. And now I own one of the Gator cases, too. No comparison. This case is lighter, smaller, fits my bass better (Warwick Corvette 5-string). Totally worth it. This is the third Gator case I have. I've got a 2-u rack case, a pedal board bag, and this bass guitar case. All are great. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: scottfwi

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my 335
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my Firefly 335 “Ibanez corn” semi hallow. Has some extra space at the bottom and is too deep at the body part so my neck doesn’t sit properly. Common problem with other 335 inspired Epiphone or the real 355 Gibson. I personally know the GC line very well and this problem has some serious design issues. I’m going to return it. Did you like it? Please press Helpfull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Guy

customer_reviews.title: 7 years later and going strong!  A perfect fit for my Fender Jazz bass!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Gator case for my Fender Jazz bass about 7 years ago in 2011. (I'm reviewing this now in 2018). I love Gator products! All of the Gator products that I own are very well made and I this case is no exception. They have been to countless gigs with me over the years (but I don't throw them around etc...) This Bass case is still going strong and looking and protecting like the day I bought it. (However, I do baby my instruments and the cases they are in.)
customer_reviews.author: 🙃 Doh!

customer_reviews.title: Gator dropped the ball on this one. Purchased thru ...
customer_reviews.text: Gator dropped the ball on this one. Purchased thru Amazon Warehouse. Case was molded wrong having about 5/16" difference in the width of the case from the head stock end versus the body end and documents say it was inspected. This caused other problems to develop with the hard shell, molding and latching of the case itself. I have other Gator cases, which are solid, balanced and well padded and hold the instrument secure. I purchased this for an Ibanez SRX. It fit very well with minimal movement. I was planning on future purchases. Just be cautious of possible quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Offers great protection and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. My bass fits perfectly inside. There are two pockets for holding strap or other loose gear and when the case is closed it completely covers them holding the loose stuff in place. The internal padding actually compresses against the guitar with a tight fit. I'm sure that it will provide excellent protection against drops. I'm actually thinking of switching my Fender Guitars over the Gator cases now.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Practical

customer_reviews.title: Strike One
customer_reviews.text: Well I received my first case it was visibly scuffed and one of the latches was broke off. It was obviously used, the packing box was still in good shape, but the case looked like hell. Other than that, it just seems cheaply made. I have ordered a replacement because it does fit my Sterling bass well, and unfortunately if I was to order a case from Ernie Ball it would be twice as much. I just hope the incredibly cheap latches and interior felt insulation will hold out a few years, as I said, its very cheaply made, I almost think a gig bag might be better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Good case, well built.
customer_reviews.text: What it is: A very sturdy hard case for your bass. What it is not: A custom fit hard case for a specific bass. A very nice generic hard case for your bass. My custom Carvin Case was molded to my bass and there is zero slop when it's closed. This case does it's best to secure my G&L, and works quite well. It's not locked-down tight, but then again, it's not $200 either. Great if you have multiple basses, a J-bass and a P-bass. It will fit most of them, maybe not a Thunderbird or something strange, but if it looks like a basic Fender bass, you should be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Decent case, good value
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the case two weeks, and it seems to be a fairly protective item. It is not heavy duty at all, but... for a place to keep the guitar at home, or toss it in the truck for gig or jam, its fine, and the cost is not too bad. If you're a musician that plays out on the road for a month, doing 25 shows in 20 different venues, you probably want something more heavy duty (and costly). For us mere mortals that want something to protect under moderate abuse, zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B

customer_reviews.title: A VERY nice case.....you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: As with every other Gator product I own or, have ever owned, it's top notch. A good, solid case at a reasonable price. It fits my '96 MIK Les Paul Standard Plus Top perfectly. The guitar doesn't move around at all with the lid open. And it fits perfectly with the lid closed too. All the valences line up as they should. I bought a refurbished case and it comes complete with factory tags and warranty info. I looked the case over carefully and checked all the hardware. I can't find a mark, defect or potential future problem(s) anywhere. It's looks like a brand new case but, at about 40% less. Very satisfied with both the case and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Decent case for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent case. Smells a little chemically funny when you first open it so storing a guitar in this may not be the best idea. Fits my PRS CE24 reasonable, but it can shift around about an inch front to rear but other than that a decent case for the price.
customer_reviews.author: valley2013

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar Case fit a PRS CE 24
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my PRS CE 24 that only comes with a soft case which is nice but can’t offer near the support and protection that this very reasonably priced Gator case offers. It’s an excellent fit with great neck support and two open spaces for accessories. I fold a soft cloth over the storage space to ensure things stay put. Great value and excellent protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. S

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit all around.
customer_reviews.text: Durable case. Not anything special and a little narrow considering I ordered the extended length version and assumed that maybe longer neck guitars like my 7 string might also have bigger bodies too. Had to take a knife and remove some styrofoam lining to fit my guitar in. Not a huge deal but this case could benefit from a few extra inches on each side. Also the neck channel is stupid narrow, like fender guitars only narrow. If you've got a baseball bat of a neck this case probably won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have been disappointed with some ABS cases. They were always so flimsy. This Gator Case is nice and sturdy! The inside is very plush to protect my axe. Added bonus, this one has an LED light strip in it! Now I can see instead oof fumbling around in the dark offstage. Awesome case! Should also be able to withstand baggage handlers.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Betz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thin case that makes me nervous. Light is very cheap, and batteries die very quickly in it. You could mount a much better one in the regular case. For this price, go with a nicer case
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T. Clem

customer_reviews.title: Best case for your $
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Gator case now for five years and she's holding up well. Both my Ibanez basses fit perfectly inside. The two handy compartments are great for storing my tuner, music stand light, picks, wiping cloth, cable, and strap. I highly recommend this case very durable yet light weight.
customer_reviews.author: JByrne3

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the PRICE (key word, price).
customer_reviews.text: If your a beginner or on a budget this is going to be the biggest bang for your buck at around $80 dollars. This case will definitely survive a plane trip, being dropped while being carried by the handle, or the normal tipping over that happens when left upright by the kids. I would strongly suggest that everyone has a hard case unless you don't plan on using outside the home and it's always on display. Soft cases don't protect neglect...
customer_reviews.author: WiskiDave

customer_reviews.title: Works with  2018 Gibson SG HP
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Case as a go to for my 2018 Gibson SG-HP as the orginal metal Case, is more for storage not practical for on the fly Giging . Looks Great well built and rugged , it is just a little lose around the edges no big deal, lay a nice cleaning cloth underneath to snuggle up with, Serves a double purpose, your gona wipe the sweat off your Axe, when your done being a rock star Anyway ...Your Welcome !!!
customer_reviews.author: ThomasJ F.

customer_reviews.title: keys suck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a good hard case to use for my guitar mostly for traveling, originally in the first place for moving house. It's an awesome hard case, lots of room for any extras you want to put in like cords and straps. However the keys are really awful. I have a different case for my bass and it uses the same keys which work just fine in the lock on that case. On this case the keys that came with it locked it fine but don't work to unlock it and they are very flimsy if you try to hard to turn them in the lock the metal of the key will bend.
customer_reviews.author: Thackary

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Eps G400 perfectly supports the neck well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy case and the interior is well fitted. The guitar fits snugly and doesn't move around when carried. Generous storage area for tuner, picks and spare strings. There is no strong new case odor that some other cases give off. I would recommend it to anyone needing a case for an SG or G400.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Ibanez SR300 bass and I love it. Fit's like a glove. I wish it had more compartments near the top end of the guitar, but I find stuff doesn't shift around too much when transporting it. The light is nice and fairly bright, but I haven't needed to use it much yet. Quality seems great. Would highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the case arrived damaged with a foot-long crack along the top near the latch. I returned it and went to a local guitar store to buy a molded type.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Case For the Price
customer_reviews.text: My Epiphone SG G400 Pro fits it perfectly. I don’t think I would ever check it on a plane. But it has taken some light abuse at gigs and is holding up nicely. I haven’t had any issues with the latches. Stickers stick to it just fine. Decals do not.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Q

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price, light weight, protects my guitar, easy to carry. Would have gotten five stars if the address label hadn't fallen off after a few weeks. I would recommend or purchase this case again and it is likely my third or fourth case from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case for Fender P Bass
customer_reviews.text: My Fender P Bass fit perfectly in this case ! Cheers Gator Cases , And thumbs up to the seller as well . Case is excellent quality and very durable . Most cases the instrument floats around a bit ( especially cheap ones ) this case is all neck support , bass doesn't move at all ! Great case ! Great price !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a bass guitar case!
customer_reviews.text: I normally agree with Amazons best value choices and I have bought many of them. But for a Bass guitar case. This should be Amazon's pick for best overall value. Even though its more money its truly worth the little difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Chronister

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how much I qualify to rate this case. I won't be throwing it in the belly of a touring bus or in a utility trailer. That said, the case strikes me as very sturdy. The bass rests securely, no moving around. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: L'Chaim the Maggid

customer_reviews.title: Interior dimensions are inaccurate.  Would not fit my guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Was about half an inch too short to fit my Strat. Amazon delivered it in a box that you could have fit 5 cases in stacked on top of each other. Talk about a waste of shipping dollars. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Houseknecht

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for the clumsy
customer_reviews.text: Seems that as soon as I get a nice new guitar I seem to not know where walls are located!! With cases that aren't as strong my guitar moves all around and bangs against the case itself, which defeats the purpose of the case!! With this case my LP fits nice and snug so that when I hit those walls that just appear out of nowhere, I know it stays protected!! Pricey (not really when compared to the cost of what it's protecting) but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mario DeMarino

customer_reviews.title: Great for standard length guitars!
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up to everyone "fit all" refers to body type, you still have to check the length of your guitar, I got this for my regular size ibanez and it is great! There was a little bit of damage on the case when it arrived but not enough for me to notice within the first couple hours. It fits my ibanez like a dream. The lock on the case could be better, right now it's like something you would find on a child's jewelry box and I am not too thrilled about how easy it would be to get in to it.
customer_reviews.author: tristan

customer_reviews.title: Solid case
customer_reviews.text: This does everything I would expect a case to do. The latches line up ... the hinges seem strong. My guitar seems well protected. I would say this case lives up to the Gator reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Durelle Leaman

customer_reviews.title: Good product from Gator Cases
customer_reviews.text: This case is very nice for the price. It has a good lining and an inside storage. It did have a very small scratch when it was unpacked which was disappointing. But I gave it to my grandson for his birthday and I knew he wouldn't give it up to be replaced. 8 yr olds just don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnermccaw

customer_reviews.title: gig bags are for dudes with damaged instruments
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold a 5-string bass with a very wide lower bout. Fits like a dream the padding on the neck area of the case looks wide enough for a 6-string bass. The latches and hinges look well placed and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant...
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated as to order this case or not. I was fearful that my lefty Ibanez Gio wouldn't fit inside, but it fits like a glove and I'm glad I decided to order it! The case is very well made, but the key for the lock looks pretty cheap (could be picked quite easily), but I have no need to lock it anyway. My guitar measures 39 inches from the end of the body to the end of the headstock, in case anyone is wondering the length. It even fits with the shoulder strap attached to the guitar. I would recommend this case to anyone with a similar style guitar! Thanks Gator Cases, and Amazon for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Practical
customer_reviews.text: This case is the best value for the money. It is durable and fits any strat size guitar like a glove. I now have about 6 of these cases and they nest perfectly together to save room while protecting guitars. Really good protection for traveling. Gator is hard to beat. I will continue to buy these when I need a case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to house a Partscaster style guitar that deserved a proper case. This is a bit thicker than your standard Strat rectangular case by an 1-1.5 inches and probably a bit better built. It fits the standard Stratocaster body well, but does not allow the vibrato arm to remain on the guitar. There is quite a bit of storage space on either side of the neck compartment, but I generally don't trust case compartments to carry anything but a cloth (nothing worse than something hard, heavy, pointy banging around in the case next to your guitar.) The case compartments are open. All in all a very worthy generic case.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Nami

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit or safeguard you're 335 style guitar
customer_reviews.text: The guitar doesn't sit properly in this case and it put's undue pressure on the neck, The top on the guitar body is not touching the supporting pad. I bought it for a Heritage 535, I also tried it with an Episode Sheraton I have, it's terrible for both. Though they sell it for a 335 it would be better suited for a larger body guitar like a L5 or ES175.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Gimenez

customer_reviews.title: Seems Durable, nice inside
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be well constructed and the interior is fairly plush to help protect the guitar. The latches and hinges are of decent quality as is the handle and other components. Larger guitars or those that have irregular shapes (like the Beastmaster) won't fit, but normal sized/shaped electric ones will fit nice and snug. I probably wouldn't have any reservations checking this in as luggage when flying for fear that the guitar would be damaged, because I don't think it would. However I probably wouldn't check it as baggage because though the guitar wouldn't get harmed, the case would take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: NYRKIK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a Christmas gift for my grandson. He said he liked the case, found it very sturdy, and cradled his guitar well.
customer_reviews.author: IrishMom52

customer_reviews.title: Durable to lots of abuse.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent me 2 cases on accident. I called them and offered to return one but they said to keep it. I'm still using my first one and it's made about a dozen Alaska to either Dubai or Papua New Guinea trips. Dubai's on 1 airline sometimes 2 but the trip over to PNG requires 4 airlines. So, it gets abused but the case is rock solid. I'd definitely buy another one but I don't think I'll need to for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Love the gator texture.
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable case and I would recommend this item to anyone who is tough on their case. My son uses this to carry his guitar to school daily and it seems to hold up great.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like Gator products, this is no exception, at first my Strat wouldn't fit, but I had strap locks on it, I took the strap off and it fir perfectly. nice and cushy inside, smells awesome inside (I'm a wierdo I know, but I love that smell). The only thing that kept it at 4 stars is that it doesn't have "feet" on the narrow bottom end, so you could stand it up. Otherwise it feels good and sturdy, the lid closes nice and the three latches feel secure, probably nor an ATA case, but then I'd never check my baby so I'm not worried about that. Long story short, It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Bizzell

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly well constructed for the cost, and my strat fits in tightly after the vib/lever is removed. However, I'm a bit disappointed with the so-called storage compartment: it cannot hold all my accessories, nor does it have an independent lid to stop the items from sliding around the case (so I have to stuff a towel over the compartment to hold stuff in).
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Best case for the money
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. Lockable, sturdy, plenty of padding inside, place for storage, you cant beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: SUPERCOUP

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, and reasonable quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The case is overall well made but the plastic handle could be a bit more comfortable. Unfortunately, it is not as good a fit as I was hoping for. My guitar is a bit small for the case. The DBZ Imperial I have has proved to be a tough guitar to find a case for, and the DBZ Imperial case has proved difficult to locate. I will probably keep this case to avoid a hassle. The fit could be a bit better but this case should be effective in protecting the guitar from most harm. UPDATE: I returned the Gator case in favor of a DBZ Imperial case which fits perfectly. Well made too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pierno

customer_reviews.title: The best case
customer_reviews.text: Ok I love this case. This is my first Gator case, they have really won me over. Some of the reviews are saying trouble with lock lining up I have no problems with mine......Great case....My Fender Clapton Stratocaster fits like a glove. This is one of the best cases for the money you can buy. Les Pauls WILL NOT FIT.....this is a nice case, with a nice interior for your strat or tele ..... Im buying another for my tele......You cant go wrong with Gator
customer_reviews.author: r moo

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Stratocaster like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: This case is quality. Gator makes amazing products that will protect your gear and last for a long time. I own a 2007 Fender Stratocaster HSS, and this case fits it like a glove. It is snug on all sides, and will not slide around in the case. The liner is very soft and will protect your guitar's finish nicely. The extra space for storage is great for spare strings, tools, or accessories. I would recommend this to anyone who owns a Stratocaster.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M.

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Telecaster fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Telecaster fits perfect. Expected a bit bigger compartments, but its still enough to put basic things inside. There is a bit of space under guitar head where you can also store stuff, such as pedal, but make sure to secure it. Outside material is heavy. Hard plastic and looks nice at same time. Locks are good as well, simple opening.
customer_reviews.author: Danijel Bjelos

customer_reviews.title: Great case, right price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built, solid case. For my money I don't know what could possibly be better. I bought it for my fender mustang bass and it fits petty well. Also I love that Gator is a good competitor to SKB that does not sponsor heartless stingray hunts. 10/10 would (and probably will) buy another.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Solid hardshell case, as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad - fits my G&L ASAT classic, but not my Jazzmaster. It is quite a bit bigger then a regular strat/tele style case. I've got a few gator cases for various axes, and they work well, nothing earth shattering.
customer_reviews.author: SR Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fits Mustang PJ bass
customer_reviews.text: Read online that the XL Guitar case would fit my Fender Mustang PJ Bass... an extra half inch would be nice, but this is more than adequate. Sturdy case, great for, great price - don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep moisture out. Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: So first off it was delivered and left in the pouring rain. At least the case seemed dry. I put my guitar in it, pulled it out one day later and my guitar is filled with moisture. Would never buy again and am returning it. Also just had to pay 26 bucks to return. All around horrible experience. Half of the blame goes to the delivering company.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Great case buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This case is great it isn't the a1 greatest case but I think for normal use this is above standard and I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: dale8dawn

customer_reviews.title: Gator Deluxe ABS case
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. Has a great look and it's a great value. Nice plush interior. Fits my Ibanez RG2EX1 perfectly. I only left a star off because it's a little more flexible than I hoped. If you push down in the center of the lid, it will flex quite a bit. It's probably not a going to hurt anything and be fine for my light traveling needs, but would have been nice if it was a little "firmer" in the center of the lid. Oh by the way, the one I got is exactly like the one pictured. Some reviews were saying that they changed the look, but mine is just like the one pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Trust the Gator for protection!
customer_reviews.text: Is a great home for my custom Ibanez RG8 and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Little

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Dean bass guitar perfect! Own several gator caes and swear by them! 5th graded carries one 3x week to school and still looks new!
customer_reviews.author: rnjohnson

customer_reviews.title: This item did not work with my 1959 Les Paul standard
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 1959 Les Paul standard. It did not fit properly. Whoever thinks this is for a Les Paul is purely insane.
customer_reviews.author: I just don't care anymore

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked
customer_reviews.text: This case is thin and arrived with a crack in the side. The box was not damaged, but there was not enough packing material included. If this case could not withstand the normal handling from UPS, I would not trust it to protect my guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gator Cases Deluxe ABS Bass Guitar Case (Plastic)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Dean Edge 4, which fits perfectly in it. (As an aside, my Fender Jazz and Edge 9 don't fit - but that's not why I bought this case). It is lightweight and durable enough to protect against anything I might let happen. I cannot ask for more. For the price, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven ChristieTop Contributor: Violins

customer_reviews.title: Love this Case - Lighting is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I really have no issues at all with this case. It holds my ESP perfectly. The inside is super soft, yet durable. The outside material seems strong. Hinges are not a problem, unless you YANK the top trying to break them. I would recommend this case for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case for my D’Angelico hollow body. Fits perfect and good storage inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Cottis

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed several cases at the local guitar stores and nothing was sticking out as a great buy. Some were crazy expensive. Some were not built well. Some were not built well and crazy expensive. This case seems to be the right mix of quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: SwedeNC

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe case for guitars
customer_reviews.text: I believed this to be the best guitar case available until it arrived with the bottom shattered in two places.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Strand

customer_reviews.title: I've used Gator cases on other items and they have done a great job for me
customer_reviews.text: This case seems well made. I've used Gator cases on other items and they have done a great job for me. I bought this case for an Epiphone SG Special and the lower part of the body is a little larger than the padding of the case, but I gently pushed down on the guitar and it went right in. so far so good on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C.

customer_reviews.title: For Gibson SG
customer_reviews.text: Advertised to fit an SG, it’s a little loose. Certainly not snug. Quality is so-so, I wouldn’t take it on the road. It’s fine for my purposes. Ill probably buy a strip of foam to wrap around the headstock.
customer_reviews.author: john slechta

customer_reviews.title: Not the best fit for my 2016 tribute.
customer_reviews.text: My Gibson SG tribute flops around in this case like a fish. It is a solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: G$

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken. Cheaply packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken the plastic where the steel bumpers/feet are was cracked on two and one was completely pushed into the inside of the shell... Just guled it after removing the inside liner didn't want a hassle with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Niedzwiecki

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: If I had a cheap bass, it would be fine. The upper padding was falling out. It does not fit the Warwick Streamer or Spector style bass. It is not crap, but you get what you pay for (pardon me ending a sentence in a preposition).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my MIJ `57 reissue strat perfectly...
customer_reviews.text: The only one of my guitars I have tried in the case is the Strat, and it is a solid fit! The case seems super tough and very "musician friendly," in that it should do well bouncing around the back of a van on the way to and from gigs. The strat pretty much locks into place, without movement, when you close the top. For me, I just wanted something that will keep the kids and dog from busting the neck off. This case is like my guitar safe. VERY NICE, VERY SOLID. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice built case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my dean mab. doesn’t quite fit in it the way it’s supposed too but it works. the case is very well built and keeps your guitar secure.
customer_reviews.author: The Kohneys

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: I have few basses short scale to full length 5 string. this case works very well every bass I have put in it. It holds that bass secure and there was a comment where someone said his only had 2 latches on it, Mine had 3 like the description said. good case good price,
customer_reviews.author: Ripitywitt

customer_reviews.title: Epiphone Les Paul Special Edition II
customer_reviews.text: I got this case for my Epiphone Les Paul Special Edition II. The guitar fits in the case like a glove! The interior of the case is shaped like the LP, which was a good surprise - as it seems different in the product pictures. The case is very light, but is made of good material and I believe it will protect the guitar very well. The internal pocket is not too big, but it should be enough to carry guitar strap, tuner, picks and capo...
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Fits PRS SE Semi Hollow Zach Myers/ SE 245! Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Case, high quality materials. I used this Case for a PRS SE Semi hollow Zach Myers. (Will also fit any SE 245). Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great for telecaster
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable, excellent construction quality. Gator cases are awesome. It houses my new Telecaster perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my PRS
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit a PRS CE 24 semi hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Brian X

customer_reviews.title: great case - watch the size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift for a member of my band. I did apologize to his wife. This is a great case and fits his strat very nicely. It offers good protection, is easy to carry, and he loves it. I did try to put one of my guitars in it prior to giving it to him and it was too small. This is a very specific fit for Fender Strat size or smaller. My DeArmond SG knock-off didn't fit...so be sure on the measurements before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gator cases are always great for the price and this one is no exception
customer_reviews.text: Bought of these to fit a newer tele i purchased. Little bit of wiggle room around the body but nothing that would present issues. Gator cases are always great for the price and this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: C R

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar Case
customer_reviews.text: This quality of this case amazed me. I was very impressed. It fits my LP perfectly is very snug in the case and does not wiggle around. the inside is plush and protective.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy latches
customer_reviews.text: Case interior and exterior are ok. The latches look to be flimsy for this size and weight case. Would probably not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: btyson

customer_reviews.title: It’s just not a good case!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived cracked. A good case would take a huge beating and not break. Stated simply, it’s a cheap case. Cheap hinges, cheap latches, and case materials. Okay for a cheap instrument I guess but not a good one. Description is misleading stating it’s way better than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Freda Berman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Got this to protect my husband's Les Paul. Just what I needed. We really like the fact that it locks for added security & the hard shell offers more protection than a gig bag would. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought better...
customer_reviews.text: Case is ok. Latches are on the cheap side and the packing was terrible (wrapped in plastic, in a big box with some brown paper under it; I suspect it's Gator's packaging). The case will protect for storage and local trips, but I don't have enough confidence for shipping or flight. All in all, I wish I would have spent more money and gotten top quality.
customer_reviews.author: WaltM

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a 1962 Fender Stratocaster and couldn't be happier. The fit is great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 1962 Fender Stratocaster and couldn't be happier. The fit is great. The case is durable enough for light travel.
customer_reviews.author: gsr

customer_reviews.title: The latches aren't amazing and it's a little loose so the alignment isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The latches aren't amazing and it's a little loose so the alignment isn't always perfect when closing. Other than that this is a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and will be returning both. My Gretsch baritone guitar didn’t fit and my Gretsch Junior Jet II bass did fit but just barely. I felt that if the case was dropped on end it would not protect my instrument. The interior is very poorly padded and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a friend
customer_reviews.text: A friend and I have run across a luthier who makes some cool stuff as well as repairing/restoring older guitars. My friend had a Tele custom made for him and needed a case so I ordered this one and it hits the spot. The neck is cradled in there nice and the guitar doesn't move at all. My buddy likes the case so I am happy. Nothing gets 5 stars - there are no generals present.
customer_reviews.author: MK Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great value case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Jazz Bass V and it fits great. Has good storage and the latches are secure. My only dislike is it’s bigger than I thought it would be. Means more protection though so all good.
customer_reviews.author: gucu

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: Large case for my european car trunk, but very protective item for my musical instrument
customer_reviews.author: ATV

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I was able to take this on a plane and my first guitar was completely undamaged. It holds all my accessories easily, it is a dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, lightweight, and holds a Tele very well! The liner is great quality and I feel like my guitar is safe in this case!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Basham

customer_reviews.title: My new Gator Case Deluxe ABS Fit-All Electric Guitar Case (Plastic)
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product and intend to do for further business with Gator Cases as a direct result of my experience. Too often I have had less than adequate experiences with other alleged professional case providers. Not so the CASE in this CASE. In this Case you have made me happy and restored some confidence in credibility of service intent. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: William M. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great case, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Jackson DKMG. This is my 1st Gator case, and I'm very pleased with it. It is similar to SKB and fits my guitar very nicely. Being lightweight is a big plus as well, and also the secure feeling of having a HSC. I will definitely buy this again for other guitars and highly recommend it. Just remember that this model is for standard type axes; Strats, Teles and such.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The case was perfect for my Ibanez RG guitar and seems to be constructed reasonably well. It has one locking latch, which some lower priced hardshell cases do not.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used it about a 2months. Not moved around a lot. But all latches still operating
customer_reviews.author: And 7

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: First perfect on my Les Paul and cheaper than the one I returned at my local music shop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Epiphone and Gibson Les Paul guitars
customer_reviews.text: Great case. The only downside is the very small storage compartment, but since it's shaped like a guitar, you loose the additional area of a rectangular case.
customer_reviews.author: Marg K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a MIM Fender Stratocaster!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Gator hard shell case for my MIM Fender Strat. It's a "fit-all" case but it fits my Strat so perfectly that you would think it was designed for it. I also thought it would be bulkier, but it's really not that bulky. I'm glad I chose this over a tweed case.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for transporting his guitar back and forth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for our son for Christmas present in 2013 and that it's August 2014 we can assuredly say that our son loves this case and so do we. It's perfect for transporting his guitar back and forth. Gator stands up to its toughness! ​
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Fuller

product_meta.title: Gator Cases Deluxe ABS Molded Case for Strat/Tele Style Electric Guitar with Internal LED Lighting (GC-ELECTRIC-LED)
product_meta.description: Style:Electric - LED EditionThe Gator GC Series Deluxe ABS Guitar Cases include a selection of hard shell carrying cases built with a durable plastic exterior and outfitted with features that will both pamper and protect your favorite guitar. Gator Cases is also the first to offer deluxe and durable protection matched with the luxury of interior LED light fixtures. Designed from durable ABS plastic, the exterior of the GC electric guitar LED Edition case is built to withstand impact and guard your guitar from dust and other damaging elements. The closures and outer edges are outfitted with heavy-duty aluminum valances to protect the case against damage. The LED Edition of this electric guitar case from Gator Cases is the first of its kind. As you open the lid of your electric guitar case, the LED light embedded in the interior of the case lid will switch on, perfectly illuminating the storage spaces next to your guitar so you can quickly find your pick and other accessories on the side stage before the show. The LED light can also be adjusted to be manually turned on and off. The GC electric guitar case LED Edition from Gator Cases offers the premium protection that your electric guitar deserves.
feature_bullets: Rugged Impact-resistant ABS plastic exterior for premium durability
Extra-strength handle offers a comfortable and secure grip
Heavy-duty aluminum valances reinforced the overall strength to the case
LED light illuminates storage compartment for easy access to picks, capo's, and strings while Eps foam with plush lining protects your guitar from scratches
Interior Dimensions: Body Length 18.3"/46.48 cm, Body Height 2.4"/6.09 cm, Lower Bout Width 12.6"/32 cm, Middle Bout Width 12.6"/32 cm, Upper Bout Width 12.6"/32 cm, Overall Length 39.4"/100.07 cm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,016 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
